description:
1. Create floating interest rate and attache the same while creating the new loan product.
2. Submit new loan application for a client with the floating interest defined.
3. Click on modify application and in modify loan application page click on repayment info
> Not able to view repayment info displayed error message as
"The parameter `isLoanProductLinkedToFloatingRate` has been passed and is not supported for this request."

For screenshots refer  the link:
name: Inability To View Repayment Information In Modify Loan Application Page If Floating Interest Is Defined
